Uses of Package
communication

  • Packages that use communication 
    Package Description
    communication  
    communication.TCP  
    controllers  
  • Classes in communication used by communication 
    Class and Description
    Interpreter
    An interpreter is used in the communication between the devices to handle the objects received from the packets.
    Protocol.Flag
    A flag, present in the head of each packet, indicate in which way the synchronizer should interpret the tag and the data of the packet.
    Protocol.Tag
    When the flag of a packet is OBJ, the tag role precises the interpreter to call with the object.
  • Classes in communication used by communication.TCP 
    Class and Description
    Packet
    A packet is a data structure used by the synchronizer's TCPserver and TCP client, which respects a protocol.
  • Classes in communication used by controllers 
    Class and Description
    Transmitter
    The role of a transmitter is to execute some code which implies a communication with the other device directly within the controller.
